events.1838: Bankim Chandra Chattopadhyay (Chatterjee), famous novelist, "the father of modern Indian fiction" and writer of national song 'Vande Mataram', was borm at Katalpara near Naihati, West Bengal. Some of his writings are 'Anandmath' and 'Kapal Kundala'. He was among the first two Bengalee Graduates.
events.1839: Maharaja Ranjit Singh, ruler of Punjab and Spiritual Guru of sikh community, passed away.
events.1894: Chhaganbapa (Chhaganlal Karamshi Parekh), great social worker, was born.

events.1917: Khanderao Moreshwar Rangnekar, cricketer (batted in 3 Tests India v Australia 1947-48), was born in Maharashtra.
events.1922: Vaidyalingam Akhiladam Perunglur, Gyanpeeth awardee and famous Tamil author, was born.

events.1998: Mr. Nikhil Chakravartty, journalist and chairman of Prasar Bharati, dies in New Delhi at 84.

events.2000: Maneka Gandhi, Union Minister of State for Social Justice and Empowerment, launches National Initiative for child protection of which childline is an integral part.
